resources.string:
What"'"s new in this release
 
 Direct paging for CodeMessaging.net is now supported!!!
 
 New Locations:
 Sarasota County, FL
 Wayne County, NJ
 Delaware County, NY
 Union County, OH
 Crawford County, PA
 Humphreys County, TN
 Prince George County, VA
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Montgomery County, MD
 Calhoun County, MI
 Montgomery County, NY
 Wyoming County, NY
 Harnett County, NC
 Berks County, PA
 Charleston County, SC
 
 General Fixes:
 Changed & to AT in map searches sent to Google Maps. This does a better job of locating overpasses reported as intersections.
